synopsis.text: School baseball star Takao Taniguchi's dreams are shattered when a finger injury forces him to hang up his glove. Now at Sumitani High School, he spends his days longing for the baseball diamond, until the charismatic soccer team captain Aiki spots his athletic potential and recruits him to the team. Despite his initial reluctance and lack of experience, Takao's dedication and natural talent propel him to become a key player. However, his passion for baseball never fades, leading him to secretly umpire games. When Aiki discovers this, he encourages Takao to join the struggling baseball team in need of a leader. With Takao's unwavering spirit and newfound camaraderie, the team embarks on a journey to turn their fortunes around and rekindle his love for the game.
